description: The search for your perfect Port Coquitlam townhome stops here. A spacious 2-storey floor plan that you will not outgrow. 2,085 sq ft of optimal living space including welcoming foyer, living/family rooms, dining area, 3 large bdrms, 2.5 baths & an upstairs walk-in laundry. 2 cozy gas FPs & CENTRAL A/C. The eat-in kitchen steps out to a quiet yard gated for privacy. Professionally painted throughout Jan 2026. An expansive double car garage. BONUS: 911 sq ft superb storage w/ 5'4' ceiling height. List of updates available. A well-cared for & property designed end-unit townhome with optimum functionality for your desired lifestyle. Next to Blakeburn Elem & Blakeburn Lagoon. Walk to Terry Fox Sr. coffee shops, transit, grocery & more. O/H Sun Feb 1 CANCELLED
